description:
Gao and Bal are ready to train, but first they have to deal with homework. Gaito and Abygale want to confront Kyoya, but Tasuku and Jack argue that they should leave it to the Buddy Police. A Buddyfight ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Colliding Forces! Tasuku Ryuenji vs. Gaito Kurouzu?!
ゲキトツ! 龍炎寺タスクVS黒渦ガイト!?
